murk.config.general_lightThreshold.toolt:
Light level below which Murk's Grasp effect triggers.
Must be between 0 and 15.
murk.config.general_enableWarningText.to: Show warning messages in chat when nearing or entering darkness.
murk.config.general_dimensions.tooltip:
Dimensions where Murk's Grasp applies.
Use IDs like "minecraft:overworld" or "minecraft:the_nether".
murk.config.general_enableUnderwaterLigh: Check light levels when the player is underwater.
murk.config.general_enableCreativeEffect: Apply Murk's Grasp to players in Creative mode.
murk.config.effect_litAreaEffectDuration: How long (in seconds) Murk's Grasp persists after entering a lit area.
murk.config.effect_blindnessEnabled.tool: Apply Blindness effect alongside Murk's Grasp.
murk.config.effect_baseDamage.tooltip: Initial damage per interval from Murk's Grasp (in half-hearts).
murk.config.effect_maxDamage.tooltip: Maximum damage per interval after 60 seconds (in half-hearts).
murk.config.effect_damageInterval.toolti: Time between damage ticks from Murk's Grasp (in seconds).
murk.config.lightSource_droppedItemRadiu: Radius (in blocks) to detect dropped light-emitting items.
murk.config.lightSource_nearbyPlayerRadi: Radius (in blocks) to detect light from nearby players' items.
murk.config.lightSource_lightSources.too: List of items that emit light when held, in trinket slots, dropped, or held by nearby players. Format: {id: \"minecraft:torch\", luminance: 14, water_sensitive: true} Make sure to create the correct json file in assets/murk/dynamiclights/item so the item actually emits light visually
murk.config.lightSource_lightSources.lum: Light level emitted by the item (0-15).
murk.config.lightSource_lightSources.wat: If true, the item stops emitting light underwater.
